description:
Autumn Books editor and Ronaldo fan, Sanzu, shows up at Ronaldo`s office, Sagyo gets caught up in Handa`s schemes, and Tsujigiri Nagiri meets his match?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Le cri du cœur de Sanzu / Accroche-toi, Sagyô ! / Le retour du casse-pieds
Lovecall of Sanzu / Do Your Best, Sagyo / Chaosman Is Back
Lovecall of Sanzu / Ganbare Sagyou-kun / Kaette Kita Mechakucha Man
Lovecall of Sanzu / がんばれサギョウくん / 帰ってきたメチャクチャマン
